content: You will next receive an image containing several arrow-shaped flags, some pointing to the left and others pointing to the right. You need to tell me the number of flags pointing left and the number pointing right, and provide your answer in the format 'left:1 right:3'. (Note that your response should contain only the specified format and no other text.)(Notice that if the same image undergoes an inverse color process, the result number should remain the same.)
